articles.description: Oscar Pistorius, former Olympian and Paralympics star, shot his girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp dead with four bullets in 2013.
articles.content: Oscar Pistorius, who in 2012 became the first double amputee to compete on the track at an Olympic Games, on Friday was released from prison on parole, nearly 11 years after killing his girlfriend Re… [+4313 chars]

articles.title: Grandmaster Praggnanandhaa gets big sponsor - The Statesman
articles.description: In 2023, he became the world's youngest chess player to reach the World Cup final, and only the second Indian after Viswanathan Anand to achieve the feat.
articles.content:
18-year-old Grandmaster R Praggnanandhaas career will receive a major boost with backing from the Adani Group.
